title: Compiler error while compiling cargo
body:
Hi all,

I probably ran into a bug in the compiler while compiling [cargo](https://github.com/carlhuda/cargo). I checked out [eca69ffe562dd2ea5cd8a70f6a9a346a231b9ce2](https://github.com/carlhuda/cargo/commit/eca69ffe562dd2ea5cd8a70f6a9a346a231b9ce2). See first output for Rust version, if more info is needed please ask.

```
me@local ~/Dev/cargo (git)-[master] % rustc -v 
rustc 0.11.0-pre (cb115ac 2014-05-13 16:01:48 -0700)
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
me@local ~/Dev/cargo (git)-[master] % RUST_BACKTRACE=1 make
mkdir -p target
rustc  -L libs/hammer.rs/target -L libs/rust-toml/lib --out-dir target src/cargo/lib.rs
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://static.rust-lang.org/doc/master/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'No triple in crate', /build/rust-git/src/rust/src/libstd/option.rs:167
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f029c23baf0 - rt::backtrace::imp::write::h5653af83749ac47dn7F::v0.11.0.pre
   2:     0x7f029c1a2b50 - rt::unwind::begin_unwind_inner::h59c780648785292dqHF::v0.11.0.pre
   3:     0x7f029caf0d40 - <unknown>
   4:     0x7f029d2c5cb0 - metadata::decoder::get_crate_triple::h09682640607dd251Che::v0.11.0.pre
   5:     0x7f029d2e2a10 - <unknown>
   6:     0x7f029d2da350 - <unknown>
   7:     0x7f029d2d63e0 - metadata::loader::Context<'a>::load_library_crate::h6b07c896e8f756b8vZf::v0.11.0.pre
   8:     0x7f029d2d2060 - <unknown>
   9:     0x7f029d2c99d0 - metadata::creader::Env<'a>.visit..Visitor<(*>::visit_view_item::h57b3210eece3ec5agwe::v0.11.0.pre
  10:     0x7f029d2c8b80 - metadata::creader::read_crates::hc8c029f83c1a8ffanve::v0.11.0.pre
  11:     0x7f029cf14d60 - <unknown>
  12:     0x7f029d2f36e0 - driver::driver::phase_3_run_analysis_passes::h2224406b4f0d66010ei::v0.11.0.pre
  13:     0x7f029d2ed1f0 - driver::driver::compile_input::hd05b8012ae720c9eA4h::v0.11.0.pre
  14:     0x7f029d393030 - <unknown>
  15:     0x7f029d392f50 - <unknown>
  16:     0x7f029d3ab260 - <unknown>
  17:     0x7f029d3a56a0 - <unknown>
  18:     0x7f029f1eaa60 - <unknown>
  19:     0x7f029c2324a0 - <unknown>
  20:     0x7f029c254230 - rust_try
  21:     0x7f029c2322e0 - rt::task::Task::run::h23fe9afa6b92aac90vD::v0.11.0.pre
  22:     0x7f029f1ea810 - <unknown>
  23:     0x7f029c23a4f0 - <unknown>
  24:     0x7f029bb71060 - start_thread
  25:     0x7f029be71489 - __clone
  26:                0x0 - <unknown>

Makefile:36: recept voor doel 'target/libcargo.timestamp' is mislukt
make: *** [target/libcargo.timestamp] Fout 101
```
